items.title: Best paper nomination (AI in Healthcare)
items.detail: Our paper "Beyond Accuracy: Enhancing Parkinson's Diagnosis with Uncertainty Quantification of Machine Learning Models" was nominated for the best paper award in the International Conference on AI in Healthcare.

items.title: Paper published in NEJM AI
items.detail: My joint-first authored work is now live in NEJM AI. In this work, we investigated analyzing home-recorded smile videos for detecting Parkinson's disease.

items.title: Paper published in npj Parkinson's disease
items.detail: One of the works I supervised is now published in npj Parkinson's disease. Here we investigated a simple pangram-utterance recording for Parkinson's disease screening.

items.title: Paper published in CHI 2025
items.detail: My first-authored work from 2024 summer internship is now published in CHI 2025.
